accordions.title: Chips & Dip
accordions.content:
Get your taste buds rolling with our mouthwatering starters. Choose from Queso, Calabaza (Butternut Squash), Bean Dip, Guacamole, Mango Ceviche(Grouper) and Pico de Gallo.
Choose one - $4.99
Choose two - $7.99

accordions.title: Loaded Quesadilla
accordions.content: Large flour tortillas filled with your choice of filling and cheese. Topped with guacamole, pico de gallo and sour cream. (ADD $1 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS). Substitute VEGAN cheese for $2

accordions.title: Queso Quesadilla
accordions.content: Large flour tortillas filled with cheese. Served with guacamole, pico de gallo and sour cream on the side. Substitute VEGAN cheese for $2

accordions.title: Chips & Salsa
accordions.content: Our chips and salsa are made fresh daily and are sure to heat up your authentically-delicioso, Taco Bus experience.

accordions.title: Refried Beans
accordions.content: A great companion to any Mexican entree and made fresh the Taco Bus way, our refried beans are 100% vegan (that means no meat, lard, broth and no dairy).

accordions.title: Mexican Rice
accordions.content: A complement our fans taste journey south of the border, our Mexican rice provides a well-balanced flavor that will delight all palates - 100% vegan (that means no meat, lard, broth and no dairy).

accordions.title: Guacamole
accordions.content: Our guacamole is bursting with fresh avocados, tomatoes, onion and cilantro. A perfect enhancement to any dish or scoopably delicious on tostada chips. It's sure to delight our fans and make the Aztecs proud.

accordions.title: Crema/Sour Cream
accordions.content: Your taste buds will applaud the cool, fresh, all-natural sour cream as it soothes the spicy heat and delivers a smooth finish to every bite.

accordions.title: Two Tacos
accordions.content: Two soft corn or flour tortillas with your choice of filling and taco veggies. (add cheese + $0.30) (Add $1 VEGAN STEAK STRIPS)

accordions.title: Tostada
accordions.content: Crunchy flat tortilla smothered with pinto beans, topped with your choice of filling, taco veggies and cheese. (Add $1 for VEGAN STEAK STRIPS)

accordions.title: Burrito
accordions.content: Your choice of filling, taco veggies and cheese wrapped in an X-large our tortilla. (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: Burrito Prenado
accordions.content: X-large flour tortilla stuffed with your choice of filling, Mexican rice, refried beans, taco veggies and cheese. (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: El Jefe
accordions.content: A HUGE Burrito weighing in at over 2.5 lbs, this is the Chief!  Two tortillas, Double rice and beans, Cheese, Sour Cream, and Guacamole! A portion of the proceeds are donated to LOCAL first responder charities!

accordions.title: Quesadilla
accordions.content: Large our tortilla folded, filled with your choice of filling, taco veggies and cheese, then grilled. (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: Torta
accordions.content: Fresh baked bread, slathered with refried beans and mayo with your choice of filling, taco veggies, jalapeno strips and cheese  (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: Papos
accordions.content: Your choice of filling over tortilla chips, Mexican rice, taco veggies and queso. (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: El Plato
accordions.content: Plate piled high with your choice of filling, Mexican rice, refried beans, taco veggies and a side of tortillas (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: Salad De La Casa
accordions.content: Chopped romaine spring mix, tomatoes, corn and jicama topped with your choice of filling. Choice of Cilantro or Ancho vinaigrette. (ADD $2 FOR VEGAN STEAK STRIPS).

accordions.title: Kids Menu
accordions.content:
Cheese Quesadilla…........….............. $3.99
Taco - Meat and Cheese ONLY.............$2.99
Bean and Cheese Burrito.................. $3.99

accordions.title: Meats
accordions.content:
• Pollo
    Deliciously seasoned chicken.
  • Chicken Chipotle
    Tender chicken smothered in a creamy chipotle sauce
  • Pollo Verde
    Shredded chicken in a tomatillo sauce
  • Carne Asada
    Diced steak marinated in Mexican seasonings and grilled to perfection
  • Carne De Res Desebrada
    Shredded beef cooked 'Northern Mexican style' with tomatoes and chiles (MILD)
  • Picadillo
    Black Angus Ground Chuck in a tomato sauce with a hint of chipotle and cumin with diced potatoes and carrots
  • Carnitas
    Shredded and seasoned pork that is slow cooked until it “melts in your mouth” tender!
  • Cochinita Pibil
    Shredded pork marinated in achiote and bitter orange, then wrapped in banana leaves and slow roasted in a smoker (BASED ON A 5,000 YEAR OLD MAYAN RECIPE!)
  • Veracruz Turkey Picadillo
    Ground Turkey in a tomatillo sauce and blended with olives, raisins, and almonds
  • Chorizo Con Huevos
    Scrambled eggs with a spicy sausage

accordions.title: Seafood
accordions.content:
• Fish / Pescado
    Beer battered Grouper topped with a swirl of white cream sauce. Original recipe straight from Guaymas.

accordions.title: Vegetarian
accordions.content:
• RAJAS CON QUESO
    Strips of roasted poblano peppers (Mild) in a creamy sauce with queso fresco (Mexican White Cheese), salsa ranchera and sweet corn kernels.
  • TOFU
    Grilled tofu strips marinated with northern Mexican spices. Great vegetarian protein source.
  • PORTABELLA RANCHERO
    Sautéed portabella mushrooms, fire roasted poblanos, potatoes, tomatoes, onions and cilantro in a spicy salsa.
  • BUTTERNUT SQUASH
    Diced butternut squash grilled with sweet red peppers, tomatoes, and onions. Topped with a sprinkling of queso cotija Mexican cheese (OPTIONAL). Original recipe from the Yucatan Peninsula.
  • VEGAN “STEAK STRIPS”
    Textured soy protein, seasoned and grilled.
  • BEANS AND RICE
    Mexican rice, refried beans, taco veggies and cheese (optional).
  • TRY OUR NEW VEGAN DELICIOUS DAIRY-FREE CHEESE
    Available on our Quesadillas and Burritos for ONLY $2

accordions.title: Gluten-Free Items
accordions.content:
The following items are gluten free:
  • CORN TORTILLAS
  • CRISPY TOSTADAS
  • RICE AND BEANS
  • VEGGIES:
    Tomatoes, onions (white only), cilantro, cabbage
  • Gluten Free Fillings
  • BUTTERNUT SQUASH
  • POLLO VERDE
  • CARNE DESEBRADA
  • CARNE ASADA
  • PORTABELLA RANCHERO
  • TOFU
  • FRESH GUACAMOLE AND CHIPS (chips are gluten free)
  • BUTTERNUT SQUASH APPETIZER
  • CONCHINITA PIBIL
  • BARBACOA
  • CARNITAS
  • Gluten Free Drinks
  • PINEAPPLE AGUA FRESCA
  • THE FOLLOWING MENU ITEMS SHOULD BE AVOIDED:
  • CHICKEN CHIPOTLE
  • TORTA MEXICANA SANDWICH
  • FISH (breaded with wheat flour)
  • VEGAN STEAK STRIPS
  • FLOUR TORTILLAS
  • THE FOLLOWING CONTAIN VINEGAR:
    (Taco Bus uses white distilled vinegar on recipes.)
  • SEASONED CHICKEN
  • PURPLE ONIONS
  • RED AND GREEN SALSA

accordions.title: Tres Leches Cake
accordions.content: A moist and delicious sponge cake soaked in three kinds of milk. Baked at Taco Bus daily.

accordions.title: Flan
accordions.content: Traditional Mexican milk custard with caramel.

accordions.title: Sopapillas
accordions.content: Delicious puffed pillows of fried dough served hot, soft, & sweet drizzled with honey

accordions.title: Aguas Fresca
accordions.content:
Agua de Piña (Pineapple) Horchata (A traditional Mexican drink made from rice, condensed milk, vanilla & cinnamon)
Large ................ $2.50

accordions.title: Jarritos Mexican Soda
accordions.content: Mexico's first national soft drink and an amazing complement to Mexican food because of its nine great-tasting and authentically Mex flavors.

accordions.title: Fresh Brewed Tea
accordions.content: Our Ice Tea is brewed fresh daily and available as un-sweet or sweetened with natural cane sugar.
